```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(magrittr)
```

## R Markdown

Read in team info
```{r read}
accounts = read.csv("Accounts.csv", header=T) %>% 
  select(First,Last,Email=Recipient.Email,Saxon,R.User, Bayesian, git, unix, ML, linear.alg, program, STA601, STA523, STA601) 
summary(accounts)
```


```{r recode}
accounts = accounts %>% mutate(score = 
          as.numeric(recode_factor(unix, 
                   `have no background` = "0",
                   `a little` = "1", 
                   `comfortable to advanced background` = "2")) +
        (R.User != "have no background") +
        (Bayesian != "have no background") + 
        (git != "have no background") +
        (STA601 == "Yes") +
        (STA523 == "Yes") +
        (ML != "have no background")
)
```
